faqs.question: What are your service times?
faqs.answer: Our worship services are held every Sunday at 9:00 AM and 11:00 AM. We also have Wednesday evening Bible study at 7:00 PM.

faqs.question: Where is the church located?
faqs.answer: We are located at 123 Faith Street, Ministry City. Parking is available on-site and street parking is also available.

faqs.question: How can I contact the church?
faqs.answer: You can reach us at (555) 123-4567 or email us at info@ministryaihub.org. Our office hours are Monday-Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.

faqs.question: How do I submit a prayer request?
faqs.answer: We would be honored to pray for you. You can submit prayer requests through our website, call our prayer line, or speak with any of our pastoral staff.

faqs.question: How can I give or donate?
faqs.answer: Thank you for your heart to give! You can donate online through our website, give during service, or mail a check to our church address. All donations are tax-deductible.
